attributes.action: Remove alcohol from Westminster and introduce mandatory drug and alcohol testing
attributes.additional_details: All alcoholic beverage should be removed and prohibited from Westminster. The introduction of Drug and alcohol testing with the Random use of search dogs from a company independent from any political party.
attributes.background: Parliament should fall under the same working conditions as every other work place. No person should be under the influence of alcohol or illegal substances while making life changing decisions that effect the British public.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign these petitions which call for the same actions:

'Ban alcohol in the Houses of Parliament and all government buildings': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/604101

'Mandatory drug tests for all MPs, Lords & their staff': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602604
